Target Selection

Use the Target Selection dialog box to select the targets to be built.

After you have filled out the fields on this dialog box, click Next to go to the Build Parameters dialog box.

Field Descriptions

Serena ChangeMan Builder project A read-only field displaying the name of the Serena ChangeMan Builder project.
Build machine Choose from the available build machines set up ahead of time by the Serena ChangeMan Builder administrator. The build machine displayed by default is the one selected in the Job Selection Dialog Box. Changing the build machine also changes the target files that are selected, because each build machine has its own set of targets and settings.
Project Targets Selection Select the targets to be built, then use the right-pointing arrow buttons to move the selected targets to the Project Targets Selected list. You can use CTRL-Select and SHIFT-Select.
Project Targets Selected Displays the selected targets. If you wish to remove any targets from this list, select them, then use the left-pointing arrow buttons to return the targets to the Project Targets Selection list. You can use CTRL-Select and SHIFT-Select.
> (Add) Click to add the selected target to the Project Targets Selected list.
>> (Add All) Click to add all targets to the Project Targets Selected list.
< (Remove) Click to remove the selected targets from the Project Targets Selected list.
<< (Remove All) Click to remove all targets from the Project Targets Selected list.

See Also
